actions.abilityText: If the enemy monster has a status condition, you may choose to play two additional [B] with this action. ~STATUS~

buffs.buffText:
Super
The enemy monster gains a paralyze condition. ~SUPER~~PARALYZE~
[1]: The enemy monster gains a paralyze condition. ~PARALYZE~
buffs.flipEventText: The enemy monster gains -1[SPD] stat cubes.

buffs.buffText:
[+]
This attack gains recoil 1. If the enemy monster is paralzyed, that monster flips only [1] for its paralzyed condition this turn, ignoring of any other modifiers. ~RECOIL~.
If this attack is slower, this attack gains +{"positive": 3, "neutral": 3, "negative": 1}[ATK].~SLOWER~

abilityText: This monster's attacks gain +1[ATK] for each different status condition the enemy monster has.~STATUS~
promiseDescription: Zappguin wants nothing more than to paralyze every monster it meets. This requires a little bit of work because Zappguin is on the slower side. But a carefully timed Zap from a teammate can setup Zappguin wonderfully.
